table.name: vtiger_emailmarketing
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_emailmarketing` ( `emailmarketingid` int(11) NOT NULL, `emailmarketingno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `emailmarketing_tks_firstname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`emailmarketingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_emailmarketingcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_emailmarketingcf` ( `emailmarketingid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`emailmarketingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
